docs.text:
Ingot
#


Ingot is a user interface toolkit for 
ROBLOX
 that aims to make it easier to build complex user interfaces. Ingot extends the ROBLOX user interface objects with more complex components, like dropdowns and radio button groups.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Ingot is a user interface toolkit for  ROBLOX  that aims to make it easier to build complex user interfaces. Ingot extends the ROBLOX user interface objects with more complex components, like dropdowns and radio button groups.
docs.title: Ingot

docs.text:
Dropdown Component
#


The Dropdown component is a simple dropdown that supports selection of one item from a large amount of choices.





Properties
#


number
 AnimationTime
#


How long the dropdown's opening animation will take. If zero, no animation takes place. Defaults to 
0.3
.


Color3
 BorderColor3
#


The color of the dropdown's borders.


boolean
 CloseOnOptionSelected
#


Whether to close the dropdown when an option is selected. Defaults to 
true
.


string
 CurrentEntry
#


The currently selected item, or nil if it does not exist. Setting this will select the item corresponding to the string, or error if it does not exist. Defaults to 
nil
.


array
string
 Entries
#


The entries of the dropdown. Setting this value will remove all entries from the dropdown, then add all the entries in the assigned value.




Note


Modifying this value via 
table.insert
 will not add or remove entries from the dropdown. To modify entries, use 
AddEntry
 and 
RemoveEntry
.




Font
 Font
#


The font the dropdown uses. Defaults to 
SourceSans
.


FontSize
 FontSize
#


The size of the dropdown's text. This value is used directly for the size of the dropdown's current item text, and the value immediately below it is used as the item entry font size. For example, if this property is set to 
Size24
, the current item text will have a font size of 
Size24
 and the item entries will have a font size of 
Size18
. Defaults to 
Size24
.


boolean
 Open
#


Whether the dropdown is open or not. Defaults to 
false
.


Font
 SelectedEntryFont
#


The font that the dropdown's selected entry uses. Defaults to 
SourceSansBold
.




Note


If this is the same as 
Font
, there will be no visual difference between a selected entry and an unselected one.




number
 ShownItems
#


How many options, at most, should be shown at once when the dropdown is open. Excess options will be wrapped in a scrolling frame. Defaults to 
3
.


number
 ZIndex
#


The z-index of the dropdown. Defaults to 
1
.
docs.title: Dropdown

For example, if this property is set to  Size24 , the current item text will have a font size of  Size24  and the item entries will have a font size of  Size18 . Defaults to  Size24 .

docs.text: How many options, at most, should be shown at once when the dropdown is open. Excess options will be wrapped in a scrolling frame. Defaults to  3 .
